mapper.select: SELECT FirstPointLat, FirstPointLng, SecondPointLat, SecondPointLng, ThirdPointLat, ThirdPointLng, FourthPointLat, FourthPointLng, CentroidLat, CentroidLng FROM PolygonPoints LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RouteProperties (id, sec_len, up_min, down_min, cat_nam, mntn_nm) VALUES (#{id}, #{secLen}, #{upMin}, #{downMin}, #{catNam}, #{mntnNm})
INSERT INTO RouteGeometry (id, geometry) VALUES (#{id}, ST_GeomFromText(#{multiLineString}))
mapper.update: UPDATE RouteGeometry SET geometry = ST_GeomFromText(#{multiLineString}) WHERE id = #{id} AND geometry IS NULL
